mapper.select: SELECT CONTENT , file_path , file_original_name , file_masking_name , CREATE_DATE FROM REVIEW_FOR_STORE ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC LIMIT 4
mapper.insert: insert into review_for_store (content, file_path, file_original_name, file_masking_name, create_date) values (#{content}, #{file_path}, #{file_original_name}, #{file_masking_name}, SYSDATE());
